info: The FDA is responsible for protecting public health by ensuring the safety and efficacy of drugs and vaccines.

The EMA is responsible for the scientific evaluation of medicines in the European Union.

authority_name: Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency
info: MHRA regulates medicines and medical devices in the UK.

Health Canada regulates the safety and effectiveness of health products.

authority_name: Ministry of Food and Drug Safety
info: MFDS ensures the safety of food and drugs in South Korea.

authority_name: South African Health Products Regulatory Authority
info: SAHPRA regulates medicines and medical devices.
